meanings.definition: Present or proffer (something) for (someone) to accept or reject as desired.
meanings.sent1: She offered her friend a cookie.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a discount on all items.
meanings.sent3: He offered to share his umbrella with a stranger.
meanings.sent4: The teacher offered valuable advice to her students.
meanings.sent5: The kind man offered his seat to the elderly lady.

meanings.definition: Provide or supply (something) for use or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The company offered training sessions for new employees.
meanings.sent2: The library offered a wide selection of books.
meanings.sent3: She offered a solution to the problem that no one had considered.
meanings.sent4: The garden offered a peaceful retreat from the city noise.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant offered a diverse menu to cater to all tastes.

meanings.sent1: The hotel offered free Wi-Fi to all guests.
meanings.sent2: The park offered stunning views of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The museum offered interactive exhibits for children to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: The website offered a user-friendly interface for easy navigation.
meanings.sent5: The shop offered a variety of products to choose from.
